line.originaltext: 1/2 cup all-purpose flour
1 tablespoon light brown sugar
1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon
1/8 teaspoon salt
2 tablespoons unsalted butter
1 1/2 tablespoons ice water
1 cup skim milk
3 egg whites
2 tablespoons white sugar
1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 bananas, peeled and sliced
1 kiwi, peeled and sliced
1 cup sliced fresh strawberries
In a bowl, sift together the flour, light brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt.
In a bowl, sift together the flour, light brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt.
line.annotation: combine({ing76, ing77, ing78, ing79}, ing89, "dry stuff", "")

line.originaltext: In a bowl, sift together the flour, light brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt.
line.annotation: mix(ing89, t11, ing90, "sifted dry stuff", "sift together")

line.originaltext: Cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
line.annotation: combine({ing80, ing90}, ing91, "buttery dry stuff", "cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs")

line.originaltext: Cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Sprinkle with the ice water, and toss the mixture with a fork until evenly moistened.
line.annotation: combine({ing81, ing91}, ing92, "wet buttery stuff", "sprinkle with ice water")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle with the ice water, and toss the mixture with a fork until evenly moistened.
Sprinkle with the ice water, and toss the mixture with a fork until evenly moistened.
line.annotation: mix(ing92, t12, ing93, "dough", "toss with a fork until evenly moistened")

line.originaltext: Pat into a round, and wrap in plastic.
Pat into a round, and wrap in plastic.
Pat into a round, and wrap in plastic.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
In the top half of a double boiler, heat the milk until it begins to bubble.
In the top half of a double boiler, heat the milk until it begins to bubble.
line.annotation: cook(ing82, t14, ing94, "bubbling milk", "in top half of double boiler, heat until it begins to bubble")

line.originaltext: In a bowl, beat together the egg whites, sugar, and 1 tablespoon of the hot milk.
In a bowl, beat together the egg whites, sugar, and 1 tablespoon of the hot milk.
line.annotation: separate(ing94, ing95, "1 tablespoon of milk", ing96, "rest of milk", "")

line.originaltext: In a bowl, beat together the egg whites, sugar, and 1 tablespoon of the hot milk.
In a bowl, beat together the egg whites, sugar, and 1 tablespoon of the hot milk.
Whisk the egg white mixture into the remaining hot milk.
line.annotation: combine({ing96, ing98}, ing99, "milky egg mix", "whisk egg white mixture into milk")

line.originaltext: Cook and stir without boiling about 10 minutes, until the mixture is thick enough to coat the back of a metal spoon.
line.annotation: cook(ing99, t14, ing100, "hot milky egg mixture", "cook and stir without boiling for 10 minutes, until the mixture is thick enough to coat the back of a metal spoon")

line.originaltext: Cook and stir without boiling about 10 minutes, until the mixture is thick enough to coat the back of a metal spoon.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing100,"thick enough to coat the back of a metal spoon")

line.originaltext: Remove from heat, and stir in the vanilla.
Remove from heat, and stir in the vanilla.
Cool to room temperature.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
line.annotation: set(t16,"preheat to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)")

line.originaltext: Lightly grease an 8 inch tart pan with a removable bottom.
line.annotation: create_tool(t17, "8 inch tart pan with a removable bottom")

line.originaltext: Lightly grease an 8 inch tart pan with a removable bottom.
On a floured surface, roll the tart dough out to 1/4 inch thickness.
line.annotation: do(ing93, , ing108, "rolled dough", "on floured surface, roll out to 1/4 inch thickness")

line.originaltext: Press the chilled dough into the prepared tart pan.
Trim the edges, and pierce the bottom with a fork.
Trim the edges, and pierce the bottom with a fork.
Trim the edges, and pierce the bottom with a fork.
line.annotation: do(ing102, t18, ing107, "trimmed dough pierced with fork", "pierce bottom with a fork")

line.originaltext: Bake 15 to 18 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing107, t16, ing103, "crust", "bake 15 to 18 minutes, until golden brown")

line.originaltext: Bake 15 to 18 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown.
Remove to a wire rack, and cool completely.
Remove to a wire rack, and cool completely.
Spoon the filling mixture into the crust.
line.annotation: combine({ing101, ing103}, ing104, "crust with filling", "spoon filling into crust")

line.originaltext: Bake 18 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven.
line.annotation: cook(ing104, t16, ing105, "baked crust and filling", "bake 18 to 20 minutes")

line.originaltext: Cool to room temperature on a wire rack.
line.annotation: leave(ing105,"cool to room temperature on a wire rack")

line.originaltext: Refrigerate 8 hours.
Refrigerate 8 hours.
line.annotation: combine({ing105, ing86, ing87, ing88}, ing106, "fruit tart", "arrange fruit over the filling just before serving")
